levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [Breath], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WhenUse] Deal +2% more damage on Critical Hit for every Poise Potency on self (Max 50%)
+20% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% more damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)
levelList.name: To Claim Their Bones

levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] For every 7 [Breath] on self, Atk Weight +1 (Max +2)</style>
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WhenUse] Deal +2% more damage on Critical Hit for every Poise Potency on self (Max 50%)
+<style="highlight">30</style>% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% more damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)
<style="highlight">If this Skill targets only a single enemy, deal +100% more damage (In Focused Encounters, a single Part)</style>
levelList.name: To Claim Their Bones
